translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What the heck is this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首を傾げながら受け取るランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance tilted his head as he received it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……本当に果たし状ならいいのじゃが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (…I hope it's really a challenge letter…
Well, probably not…)
In front of Lance's eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 墨で書かれた前衛的な落書きが現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an avant-garde graffiti written in ink appeared.
"What is this? What does it say?"
"...Excited."
"…………I can't read it."
"Eeeehhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様、リセットが書いた物を……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, this is something Reset wrote...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん？　リセット。そうなのじゃよな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Reset. That's right, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん……親子で、やりとりするって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah... they said they exchange messages as a parent and child..."
"But I can't read it."
"I'm disappointed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……そう答えるとは思いましたが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well… I thought you'd answer like that.
You're an honest one."
"Hmm... well, from somewhere...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、雪ちゃんとこのじじいだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's that old man from Yukichan's place."
"Did you do this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乞われて教えただけですが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I only taught him because he asked.
Next is practicing writing characters."
"Yeah! I'll practice!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいこら。勝手にさらっていくんじゃあない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! Don’t just drag her off without permission!"
"Lance, would you like to join as well?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット殿に書く文でも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe write something to Reset."
"Why would you do a thing like that? I wouldn’t..."
"...Excited."
"Hmph. I'll just watch from the side."
"Yaaaay!"
"Then that’s perfect.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近況に関して、少し話など混ぜましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's mix in a little talk about recent news."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………お前、まさか始めからそのつもりで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You didn’t plan that from the beginning, did you...?"
"No way. It was just a coincidence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。退屈だったら寝るからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. If it gets boring, I’m going to sleep."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはリセットの毛筆練習に付き合いながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While accompanying Reset with brush calligraphy practice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局義景の話を最後まで聞くことになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance ended up listening to Yoshikage’s story until the end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて……私もそろそろ、仕事をするか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then... I suppose it’s time for me to get to work..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝倉義景は、ランス城の廊下を歩いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Asakura Yoshikage was walking down the hallway of Lance’s castle.
"If the lands you govern are vast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の在りようも多彩になるもの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: people’s ways of being become diverse as well..."
"Among them... hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やはりあの方からいくのがよいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps it is best to start with that person."
"Every single time... ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい加減にせんかーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enough alreadyーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく……あやつと来たら毎日毎日！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief... that one, every single day!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔を合わせれば妾を馬鹿にしくさりおって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whenever we meet, he just mocks me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステル・カラーがベンチで憤慨していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel Color was sitting on a bench, visibly frustrated.
"Maybe I should just cast some nasty curse again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タチの悪い呪いでも仕掛けてくれようか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to stir things up once more..."
"Lovely sunlight, isn’t it?"
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラーの長の……パステル殿でしたか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You must be Pastel, the leader of the Color tribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おくつろぎ中ですかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you relaxing?"
"You are from JAPAN... um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「朝倉と申す、小大名でございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Asakura, a small feudal lord."
"Hmm... and what is your business?"
"Just an old man taking a walk."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔を合わせれば妾を馬鹿にしくさりおって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whenever we meet, he just mocks me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パステル・カラーがベンチで憤慨していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pastel Color was sitting on a bench, visibly frustrated.
"Maybe I should just cast some nasty curse again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タチの悪い呪いでも仕掛けてくれようか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to stir things up once more..."
"Lovely sunlight, isn’t it?"
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カラーの長の……パステル殿でしたか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You must be Pastel, the leader of the Color tribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おくつろぎ中ですかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you relaxing?"
"You are from JAPAN... um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「朝倉と申す、小大名でございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Asakura, a small feudal lord."
"Hmm... and what is your business?"
"Just an old man taking a walk."
